description: Take advantage of ready-made slow-cooked brisket with this quick and easy beef brisket recipe. Heat, shred and serve for a tasty, no-fuss midweek dinner.
name: Easy Beef Brisket Rolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 700 g Woolworths COOK slow cooked beef brisket
0.25 cup Sweet Baby Ray's barbecue sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Place a little slaw on roll bases. Top with brisket and barbecue sauce. Sandwich with roll tops. Serve with remaining slaw.
